io.netty.resolver

Class HostsFileEntries

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.resolver.HostsFileEntries

  • public final class HostsFileEntries
extends Object
    A container of hosts file entries. The mappings contain only the first entry per hostname. Consider using HostsFileEntriesProvider when mappings with all entries per hostname are needed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HostsFileEntries(Map<String,Inet4Address> inet4Entries, Map<String,Inet6Address> inet6Entries)
